meanings.definition: A person who participates in rollerblading or ice skating.
meanings.sent1: The bladers at the park were practicing their moves.
meanings.sent2: Many bladers enjoy skating in the park on weekends.
meanings.sent3: The bladers had a race, but kept slipping on banana peels!
meanings.sent4: Her graceful movements on the ice made her seem like a blader in a dance.
meanings.sent5: The bladers zipped around the rink, leaving a trail of laughter behind.

meanings.definition: The edges of a blade or knife.
meanings.sent1: He carefully sharpened the bladers of his knife.
meanings.sent2: The bladers of the ice skates needed to be sharpened before the competition.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally cut himself on the bladers of the new knife.
meanings.sent4: The bladers of the sword gleamed in the sunlight, ready for battle.
meanings.sent5: The bladers of the scissors sliced through the paper with ease.
